bibl.title: Sophron's Mimes. Text, Translation, and Commentary.
bibl.seg: HORDERN J.H., Sophron's Mimes. Text, Translation, and Commentary.
Oxford, Oxford University Press, 2004, 8°, xiv-202 pp. ISBN 0-19-926613-1. £50.

C.R. par Heather White, GIF 57 (2005) pp. 171-173. - Andreas Willi, CR N.S., 55 (2005) pp. 409-411. - Bernhard Zimmermann, MusHelv 62 (2005) pp. 223-224. - Herbert Bannert, WS 118 (2005) p. 266. - Daniel Donnet, AntCl 76 (2007) pp. 262-263.
